snippet.title: Marisa of Liartop Mountain - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at the teaser trailer for Marisa of Liartop Mountain, an upcoming digital tabletop adventure RPG coming to PC via Steam in 2024. Check it out to learn more about the story, see gameplay, and more.

In Marisa of Liartop Mountain, Marisa has vanished, and a mysterious mountain has appeared! Navigate Reimu through peaks and valleys full of surprises, embarking on a journey akin to classic tabletop RPGs where dice rolls determine fate. In this branching narrative adventure inspired by classic gamebooks, turn the tide of battle against monsters with a fortunate roll, or deal with bad luck and follow the story down alternate paths.
